inputs.name: settingsFileName
inputs.purpose: (String) JMP settings file to plot from.

inputs.name: extraMarkerFiles
inputs.purpose: (List of Strings) Extra .trc marker files to plot marker errors from.

inputs.name: files
inputs.purpose: (String) .trc marker files to plot marker distance errors for.

inputs.name: onePlot
inputs.purpose: (Logical) Flag for if to include all lines on one subplot.

inputs.name: model
inputs.purpose: (String) .osim model to use in the inverse kinematics problem

inputs.name: markerFileName
inputs.purpose: (String) .trc marker file name to use in the inverse kinematics problem

inputs.name: markerNames
inputs.purpose: (List of Strings) List of markers to be used in the inverse kinematics problem

inputs.name: outputSto
inputs.purpose: (String) .sto file to write the marker errors output to.

inputs.name: timeRange
inputs.purpose: (List of Doubles, numel=2) Time range for which to solve the inverse kinematics problem
